item.title: Rupee hits fresh low, closes 15 paise down at 88.27 against US dollar

review.headline_rewrite: Rupee hits fresh low, closes 15 paise down at 88.27 against US dollar
bullets: Mumbai, The rupee declined 15 paise to close at an all-time low of ₹88.27 against the US dollar on Friday amid sustained outflow of
A weak greenback and falling crude oil prices failed to prevent the fall in local unit, forex traders said.
At the interbank foreign exchange, the rupee opened at 88.11 against the US dollar and touched the lowest-ever intra-day level of 88.38 before ending
The previous all-time low for the rupee against the US dollar was at 88.15 on September 2.

item.title: Tega Industries revises record date for final dividend, here's why; shares jump around 6%

review.headline_rewrite: Tega Industries revises record date for final dividend, here's why; shares jump around 6%
bullets: Shares of Tega Industries surged almost 6 percent in intra-day deals on Friday, September 2025 after it revised record date for final dividend from
"The Company had fixed Monday, September 08, 2025, as the Record Date for determining entitlement of Members to Final Dividend for the Financial Year
Pursuant to NSE and BSE communication dated September 04, 2025, intimating that September 08, 2025, has been declared a public holiday under the Negotiable
This announcement follows the Government of Maharashtra’s decision to declare September 8, 2025, a public holiday under Section 25 of the Negotiable Instruments Act,

item.title: Indian Oil skips US crude, buys Nigerian, Mideast oil via tender, say sources

review.headline_rewrite: Indian Oil skips US crude, buys Nigerian, Mideast oil via tender, say sources
bullets: Indian refiner Indian Oil Corp skipped the purchase of US oil in its latest tender and instead bought 2 million barrels of West African
The state refiner also bought one million barrels each of Nigerian oil grades Agbami and Usan from French oil major TotalEnergy, and another million
Nigerian oil has been bought on free-on-board basis and Das has been purchsed on a delivered basis for arrival at Indian ports in late
In its previous tender last week, IOC bought 5 million barrels of US West Texas Intermediate.
Ather has also improved packaging efficiency with the platform by incorporating the onboard charger and motor controller into the Charge Drive Controller.
